conbody.p: (g)(6) Severance pay. The Assistant Secretary of the Army (Acquisition, Logistics and Technology) is permitted to waive certain cost allowability limitations as set forth in FAR 31.205-6(g)(6). See Appendix GG for further delegation.

(p)(4)(iii) Limitation on allowability of compensation. The Assistant Secretary of the Army (Acquisition, Logistics and Technology) may establish exceptions as described at FAR 31.205-6(p)(4)(iii). See Appendix GG for further delegation.
